column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police and citizens managed to capture a man who is suspected attempting to break into condo apartments  on Street 596 in Boeung Kok II commune
column5: at 12:00 am local time. 21 February 2019.------After doing a Spiderman impression several stories up
column6: the suspect was finally detained by authorities for questioning.------UPDATE: ------The suspect
column9: is a security guard at Condominium 999
column10: who had been taking drugs before the incident.------TVFB------ព័ត៌មានបឋម៖ ខណ:នេះ​ សមត្ថកិច្ចនឹងប្រជាពលរដ្ឋកំពុងឡោមព័ទ្ធចាប់ជនសង្ស័យ​ ធ្វេីសកម្មភាពឡេីងខុនដូរមួយកន្លែងតាមបណ្តោយផ្លូវលេខ៥៩៦​ ស្ថិតក្នុងសង្កាត់បឹងកក់២​ ខណ្ឌទួលគោក​ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ​ នាវេលាម៉ោង១២រំលងអាធ្រាត្រ​ឈានចូលថ្ងៃទី២១​ខែកុម្ភៈ​ ឆ្នាំ​២០១៩​ នេះ​ ។
